title: Delhivery partners with Teamglobal Logistics for ocean freight services
description: Logistics operator Delhivery has partnered with Teamglobal Logistics to enhance ocean freight services, targeting both inbound and outbound logistics. This collaboration expands Delhivery's reach to over 120 countries for its Less than Container Load service and integrates inland Part Truckload shipping within India, benefiting businesses with a seamless cargo transportation solution.
content: Logistics operator Delhivery on Monday said it has teamed up with Teamglobal Logistics for ocean freight services with focus on both in and out-bound logistics. The strategic partnership will provide an expanded reach of over 120 countries for Delhivery's Less than Container Load (LCL) service while Delhivery, in turn, will enable in-land services of its Part Truckload (PTL) shipping solution within India to Teamglobal through its 18,700+ pin codes, Delhivery said in a statement.
